queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) WHERE all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name: $result})) WHERE NOT n=m AND all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChanges*1..]->(u:Domain {name: $result}) WITH n1,u MATCH (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChangesAll*1..]->(u) WITH n1,u MATCH p = (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChanges|GetChangesAll*1..]->(u) WHERE all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group) WHERE n.domain=$result AND m.domain<>n.domain AND all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(n:Group {domain:$result})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group) WHERE m.domain<>n.domain AND n.name<>m.name AND all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p
MATCH p=(n:Domain)-->(m:Domain) WHERE all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unconstrained Delegation Systems

queryList.query: MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m AND all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.domain=$result AND n.hasspn=true RETURN n.name, n.pwdlastset ORDER BY n.pwdlastset ASC
MATCH n=shortestPath((a:User {name:$result})-[r:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) WHERE all(rel in relationships(n) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Kerberoastable Users

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User {hasspn:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE n.domain=$result AND n.owned=true RETURN n.name, n.PwdLastSet ORDER BY n.PwdLastSet ASC
MATCH n=shortestPath((a {name:{result}})-[r:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) WHERE all(rel in relationships(n) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Owned Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:$result})) WHERE NOT n=m AND all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[*1..]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE m.domain=$result AND m<>n AND all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p

queries.name: Find All Paths from Domain Users to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain Users Group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((g:Group {name:$result})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE g<>n AND all(rel in relationships(p) WHERE NOT $mitigation in keys(properties(rel))) RETURN p
